Posts.Content: angel1985 wrote: I went for my first mammogram this month. I was called back the next day. They took more images of my left breast and then did an ultrasound. My results were( probably bengn). What should I do. Probably doesn't ease my mind. They said they wanted me to be checked again in 6 months. I don't want to wait 6 months if I have cancer now.
